title: The Little island
creator_credit: Richard Williams Films and Richard Williams
brief_description: An animated film exploring the potential for conflict between different views of life and its possible consequences. Three inhabitants of an island clash repeatedly over their respective devotion to the good, the true and the beautiful. Suitable for secondary level.
